attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hope to see the bunker boy himself and learn more about his â€œpresidencyâ€ but when I opened the app immediately I was taken back by the loud screeching noise coming from my phone. I threw my phone across the room out of complete fear, where then I realized this screeching noise was the sound of children screaming. I picked up my phone to try and see why that was, but I was then met with a knock at my door. As I rushed to see who it was all I saw was a big black van drive away from my house, however they left me a package. I was hesitant to open it but I needed to know what it was! Inside the box was a letter that stated- â€œvote for me or else.â€ And underneath the note crawled out hundreds of salamanders. Because of this app, my phone is now cracked, I fear there might be children held captive inside the app, and now I have a city of salamanders in my home.

attributes.title: Terrifying and unsafe
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support this countries president. However I canâ€™t stand by those words anymore. Not only did it take 3 days to download it took up ALL of my storage. I mean ALL. After that experience I got over it, only to find out I started getting letters sent to me from this â€œappâ€ that wanted me to join a cult with the founders...Now after all of that I STILL decided to keep this app, until, a guy with a purge mask came to my home and played â€œI am the tigerâ€ on full blast at 1 a.m. I immediately called the police and they said Donald Trump had sent him because I didnâ€™t use the app that day. Now my dog says foul language to me that he has learned from mr Trump. I can no longer support trumps psychotic actions. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU WANT SAFETY! Even after I deleted the app I still get pictures sent to me of the presidents toes. I am forever scarred for life.
